attributes.action: Keep the UK Out of Direct Military Involvement in the Ukraine War
attributes.additional_details:
Decisions of such magnitude should reflect the will of the people. Many UK citizens are concerned about the consequences of escalating involvement in foreign conflicts and believe in prioritising domestic stability and international mediation.

By signing this petition, we advocate for a cautious and responsible approach that prioritises peace, stability, and the welfare of all people involved
attributes.background:
The UK Government must remain committed to non-direct military involvement in Ukraine.

Focus on diplomatic efforts to encourage negotiations and peaceful resolutions.

Work with international partners to ensure accountability.

rejection.details:
The following petitions call for similar actions: 

Stop sending military aid to Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702525

Seek to start peace talks between Russia and Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702643
